title: New: Lorde – Team
content:
Teenage New Zealander Lorde continues her meteoric rise to fame with new track Team.

Having begun to break the US with recent single Royals, Ella Yelich-O’Connor is well on her way to worldwide stardom. Team is yet another scarily composed composition, and to draw the most overused cliche out of the book, shows immense maturity, well beyond her modest years. Check out Team below, and we’ll see you on Wednesday if you were lucky enough to get tickets to her debut London show, which sold out in 4 minutes.

‘I’m kinda over getting told to throw my hands up in the air’
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
